We need to know to answer these kinds of questions, but sometimes our humble hearts can help us more than our proud minds

Please wait, you made the same request again
Here’s a piece of bad business I’ve seen on this earth, an error that can be blamed on whoever is in charge

Even dunces who keep quiet are thought to be wise
It\'s always a pleasure speaking with you

Oh dear, perhaps the camera and sensors are offline?

I find %4$s functions a bit of a bore, %3$s, but do try one of these %1$d events from %2$s

I know about several events from Seatgeek. Click to see all searchable items.
I can support almost every type of Yelp search. Click to see example searches.

I can filter searches by location. If no location is specified then the phone\'s location will be used. Please use grammatically correct phrases, e.g. type \"restaurants in New York\", not \"restaurants New York\". For best results, please enter city and state, e.g. type "\"buffet in Las Vegas, NV\"", not \"buffet in Las Vegas\". Click to see example searches.
I can recommend performers. Ask me to find performers similar to a particular performer within a postal code. Click to see example searches.
I can sort Yelp searches by ratings or distance. Please use grammatically correct phrases, e.g. type \"restaurants by distance\", not \"restaurants distance\". Click to see example searches.
